00045 // Need to have a function prototype for the LAPACK DGESDD (REAL*8 SVD) 
00046 extern "C" {
00047   extern void
00048   dgetrf_(const int *m, const int *n, double *A, const int *lda, int *IPIV,
00049           int *info);
00050 
00051   extern void
00052   dgetri_(const int *n, double *A, const int *lda, int *IPIV, double *work,
00053           const int *lwork, int *info);
00054 
00055   extern void
00056   dgesdd_(const char *jobz, const int *m, const int *n, double *A,
00057           const int *lda, double *S, double *U, const int *ldu,
00058           double *VT, const int *lvdt, double *work, const int *lwork,
00059           int *iwork, int *info);
00060 }

00062 inline my_float_t
00063 row_dot(const int N, const my_float_t *A, const my_float_t *B)
00064 {
00065  my_float_t rv = 0.0;
00066   if(A == B)
00067     for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i, ++A) rv += (*A)*(*A);
00068   else
00069     for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i, ++A, ++B) rv += (*A)*(*B);
00070   return rv;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00075 inline void 
00076 my_axpy(const int N, const my_float_t alpha, const my_float_t* x,
00077         const int incX,  my_float_t* y, const int incY)
00078 {
00079   if(alpha == 1.0)
00080     for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i, x += incX, y += incY) *y += *x;
00081   else if(alpha == -1.0)
00082     for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i, x += incX, y += incY) *y -= *x;
00083   else
00084     for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i, x += incX, y += incY) *y += alpha * (*x);
00085 }
00086 
00087 inline void
00088 vector(const int N, const my_float_t *head, const my_float_t *tail,
00089        my_float_t *V)
00090 {
00091   std::copy(head, head + N, V);
00092   my_axpy(N, -1.0, tail, 1, V, 1);
00093 }

00159 inline my_float_t
00160 sum(const int N, const my_float_t* X, const int incX = 1)
00161 {
00162   my_float_t s = 0;
00163   const my_float_t* X_end = X + incX * N;
00164   for(const my_float_t* x = X; x < X_end; x += incX) s += *x; 
00165   return s;
00166 }

00168 /*
00170 inline int
00171 dgesdd(char jobz, int m, int n, my_float_t *A, int lda, my_float_t *S,
00172        my_float_t *U, int ldu, my_float_t *VT, int lvdt, my_float_t *work,
00173        int lwork, int *iwork)
00174 {
00175   int rv;
00176   dgesdd_(&jobz, &m, &n, A, &lda, S, U, &ldu, VT, &lvdt, work, &lwork, iwork, 
00177           &rv);
00178   return rv;
00179 }

00182 
00183 inline int
00184 la_dgetrf(const int m, const int n, double *A, const int lda, int *IPIV)
00185 {
00186   int rv = 0;
00187   dgetrf_(&m, &n, A, &lda, IPIV, &rv);
00188   return rv;
00189 }
00190 
00191 inline int
00192 la_dgetri(const int n, double *A, const int lda, int *IPIV, double *work, 
00193           const int lwork)
00194 {
00195   int rv = 0;
00196   dgetri_(&n, A, &lda, IPIV, work, &lwork, &rv); 
00197   return rv;
00198 }
